rooms.description: Open and welcoming foyer with minimalistic Scandinavian design, featuring clean lines and natural light.
Spacious living area with open-plan concept integrating Scandinavian aesthetics; large windows for abundant natural light and a view of the balcony.
Functional dining space with minimalistic decor; adjacent to kitchen area.
Modern Scandinavian kitchen with efficient layout, built-in cabinets, and natural stone countertops, ensuring a balance between form and function.
Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and private balcony; designed for relaxation and ample storage.
Second bedroom featuring a spacious balcony, ideal for a workspace or personal retreat in the bachelor pad setting.
Third bedroom with its own balcony; simple yet functional design for guest use.
Fourth bedroom with balcony integration; designed to maximize space while preserving privacy and light.
Fifth bedroom offering a cozy private balcony for personal leisure or study areas.
Sixth bedroom with a dedicated balcony; compact design that maintains the overall spacious Scandinavian feel.
Well-equipped ensuite bathroom for master bedroom; features minimalist fixtures in line with Scandinavian aesthetics.
Spacious balcony connected to the entrance hall for fresh air and natural light.

openings.description: Large wooden front door with Scandinavian design elements.
Floor-to-ceiling window ensuring abundant natural light.
Window providing ventilation and light in the kitchen area.
